content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. Using the excerpt, answer (a), (b), and (c). Briefly describe ONE purpose of the speech in the excerpt. Briefly describe ONE immediate historical effect on United States society of the ideas in the excerpt. Briefly explain ONE broader historical situation in which the excerpt was written.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
